title: sEnApatE pAlayamAm
sahitya:
sEnApatE pAlayamAm sanmuni jaNAdi pUjitAnandakara


anupallavi

 kanaka kuNDala shObhita sundara shrI nava nandanAdiyuta dhIra 
praNavOpadEsha guruguhAkAra mANikya makuTadhara karuNAkara


caraNam   vallIdEvasEnAnandakara vAnchitArtha prada caturatarakara 
vElAyudhadhara kukkuTa dhvajadhara kAlahara tripurahara shankarapura
